SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS rewardIdx
mapper.select: SELECT r.rewardIdx, r.uploaderIdx, r.description, r.type, r.url, r.status, r.point, u.userIdx as uploaderIdx, u.profileImageUrl as uploaderImageUrl, u.name as uploaderName FROM rewards r JOIN users u ON r.uploaderIdx = u.userIdx WHERE r.userIdx = #{userIdx} AND r.status = 1;
